OCD.name: Extract Top N Results
OCD.description: Takes a table and returns the top n rows by some sorting criteria

AD.name: Number of rows to keep (N)
AD.description: How many of the top rows should we keep (first 10, 20?)

AD.name: Column to sort by
AD.description: Which column should the rows be sorted by?

AD.name: Sort from highest to lowest
AD.description: When choosing the top n rows, should the rows be ranked from highest to lowest (descending), or lowest to highest (ascending). Default (checked) is descending.
